We should put an error message in the dialog. Do we handle the case of not 
showing launch configs from closed projects in the tree too?

Fixed in CommonTab.  Selection dialog no longer shows closed projects, and an error message is 
shown if a closed project is keyed in.  The tree was already not showing shared configs in closed 
projects based on behavior of LaunchManager.  Please verify.
